features.title: Independent Floors for Rent
features.description: These are ideal for small families or working professionals who desire the privacy of a standalone unit without the maintenance hassle of a large house. Independent floors typically offer dedicated access, separate utilities, and usually feature 2 BHK or 3 BHK configurations. They are a highly popular option among those looking for an affordable yet private rent house in Sector 63A.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Rent House in Sector 63A
faqSection.description: We answer the most common queries potential tenants have regarding independent homes, lease agreements, and local amenities within Sector 63A Gurgaon, helping you make an informed decision when you decide to rent a house here.

faqs.question: What types of independent houses are most commonly available for rent in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: The most common rental properties available are newly constructed independent builder floors, typically 2 BHK and 3 BHK configurations. Additionally, several luxury 4 BHK and 5 BHK villas, often located within smaller, exclusive enclaves, are also available for premium renters seeking expansive space and superior amenities. Our platform clearly filters these options based on your specific requirements.

faqs.question: Is Sector 63A a safe locality for families seeking an independent rent house
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 63A is considered very safe. Many independent houses are situated within well-developed pockets or smaller, highly secure gated communities that feature round-the-clock security patrols and controlled access points. The area is residential in nature and benefits from proactive local community management, ensuring a secure environment for all residents.

faqs.question: How does the rental cost of an independent house compare to an apartment in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: Generally, renting a full independent house or a spacious villa in Sector 63A will command a higher rental price than a similar-sized apartment unit due to the increased privacy, land area, and exclusive access provided. However, builder floors often offer a middle ground, providing independence at a price comparable to premium high-rise apartments.

faqs.question: What is the typical lease duration for a rent house in Sector 63A Gurgaon
faqs.answer: The standard lease agreement duration for residential properties in this area is 11 months, which is renewable upon mutual agreement between the tenant and the landlord. Longer leases, such as 24 months, can also be negotiated, particularly for corporate leases or high-value villa rentals, depending on the landlord’s preference.

faqs.question: Are independent houses in Sector 63A generally furnished or unfurnished
faqs.answer: A mix of options exists. Many new builder floors are offered semi-furnished, including modular kitchens and high-quality wardrobes. However, several premium independent houses and villas are available fully furnished to cater to the transient professional population, requiring a higher monthly rent but offering complete convenience.

faqs.question: What are the key connectivity advantages of renting a house in this sector
faqs.answer: The primary advantage is unparalleled connectivity via the Golf Course Extension Road, providing quick access to NH-48 and major business parks. Furthermore, Sector 63A is positioned favorably for future infrastructure developments like the Southern Peripheral Road and proposed rapid metro expansion, ensuring seamless movement across Gurgaon and Delhi.

faqs.question: Do I need to pay a security deposit for renting an independent house here
faqs.answer: Yes, standard practice dictates a refundable security deposit. This deposit typically ranges from two to three months’ worth of rent, depending on the property value, the level of furnishing, and the individual landlord’s policy. This amount is held against damages and non-payment of utilities upon lease termination.

faqs.question: Are pets usually allowed in independent rental houses in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: Pet policies are determined individually by the landlord. Compared to apartment complexes with strict RWA rules, independent house landlords are often more flexible. It is crucial to confirm the pet policy upfront during negotiations, as some may allow pets subject to an increased security deposit or a specific clause in the lease agreement.

faqs.question: What amenities should I expect when I rent a luxury villa in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: Luxury villas often include premium features such as private terrace gardens, dedicated servant quarters with separate entry, power backup systems for the entire house, high-end modular fittings, and sometimes access to a shared society clubhouse, pool, or gym if the property is part of a larger, managed compound.

faqs.question: How do I start the process to view a potential rent house in Sector 63A
faqs.answer: Start by using our platform filters to shortlist properties that meet your size and budget requirements. Once you have selected a few houses, you can use the contact form provided below or call our property management team directly. We will coordinate with the landlord to schedule site visits at your convenience, usually within 24 to 48 hours.
